author: schneiml
body:
Some larger changes to the Phase1 DQM to bring the selection of plots closer to what was agreed on with the pixel experts. This reqired also implementing some missing features and fixing some bugs. (also @fioriNTU @davidcarbonis )
- Allow creating acutal `TProfile`s in step1. 
- Also allow that in 2D.
- Move larger parts of the specifications into a central place, to make it easier to change "defaults". This is pure python magic.
- Slightly change the semantics of specifications involving counts and time on one axis. This leads to a more useful output that could not be specified outherwise, but the definition is a bit vague.
- [Update] also adds the error bars in the profile-like plots from harvesting.
- [Update 2] Fix a bug in the trend plots that potentially also affected others.
title: Phase1 Pixel DQM Plot Changes
